pages.terms-conditions: Terms of Use - Rules and Guidelines for Using RunChase RunChase +91-721-2550130 Home Why are we Possibilities Our achievements About Us Terms of Use In-App Purchases and Virtual Items RunChase may offer in-app purchases, including but not limited to virtual items, currency, or subscriptions. pages.thanks: Thank You for Joining Us - RunChase Appreciation Page Thank You for Reaching Out! We truly appreciate you taking the time to connect with us here at RunChase. Your thoughts, questions, and feedback are invaluable to our team. We believe that communication is the key to building a strong and supportive community. Our dedicated team is working diligently to review and respond to each message we receive. Please allow some time for our team to get back to you. We aim to respond within 48 hours, and we promise to give your message the attention it deserves. In the meantime, feel free to explore our website and learn more about the exciting world of RunChase. We're constantly updating our content and adding new features to enhance your experience. We hope you enjoy being part of our community as much as we enjoy having you! Once again, thank you for connecting with us. We look forward to continuing the conversation and growing together in our pursuit of excellence. Remember, at RunChase, we're not just running; we're chasing our dreams and goals. Return to Homepage

pages.index: Welcome to RunChase - Your Ultimate Cricket Gaming Experience RunChase +91-721-2550130 Home Why are we Possibilities Our achievements About Us Welcome to RunChase Experience the thrill of cricket like never before with RunChase. Dive into exciting matches, strategize your gameplay, and lead your team to victory. Whether you're a cricket enthusiast or a casual gamer, RunChase offers an unparalleled gaming experience tailored just for you. Get the application Why Choose RunChase RunChase stands out with its realistic gameplay, intuitive controls, and immersive graphics. Designed for cricket lovers, it promises endless entertainment and a true-to-life cricketing experience. Realistic Gameplay: Feel the intensity of real cricket matches. Intuitive Controls: Easy to learn, hard to master. Immersive Graphics: Stunning visuals that bring the game to life. To learn more Features Key Highlights Ultimate Challenge Face off against the best and prove your skills. Custom Matches Create your own tournaments and play with friends. Career Mode Build your cricketing career from the ground up. Our Achievements Milestones Reached RunChase is not just another cricket game. It’s a community of cricket lovers who thrive on competition and fun. 1M+ Players Worldwide 500+ Tournaments Played 100K+ Matches Won About Us Our Story RunChase was born out of a passion for cricket and a love for gaming. Our team of dedicated developers and cricket enthusiasts worked tirelessly to bring you the most authentic cricket gaming experience possible. Our mission is to provide cricket fans with a platform where they can enjoy their favorite sport anytime, anywhere. We believe in continuous improvement and regularly update the game with new features and enhancements based on player feedback. Explore More What We Offer Multiplayer Mode Play with friends or challenge players worldwide. Live Events Participate in live cricket events and win exclusive rewards. Training Sessions Hone your skills with our in-depth training modules. Get in Touch Contact Us We’d love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, feedback, or just want to say hi, reach out to us through the form below. I accept privacy policy Send a message RunChase © 2024 RunChase. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - How We Protect Your Information | RunChase RunChase +91-721-2550130 Home Why are we Possibilities Our achievements About Us Privacy Policy Changes to this Privacy Policy We reserve the right to modify this Privacy Policy at any time. If we make any changes to this Privacy Policy, we will notify you by updating the "Last Updated" date at the top of this page and by posting a notice on our website or mobile application. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy regularly for any changes. Your continued use of our services after any changes to this Privacy Policy will constitute your acceptance of such changes. Security We take reasonable measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information. You should use caution when transmitting personal information over the Internet, and you should keep your account password and other login information confidential. Your Rights and Choices You have certain rights and choices regarding the personal information we collect and how we use it. These rights and choices include: Access and Portability: You have the right to request access to the personal information we hold about you and to receive a copy of that information in a portable format. Correction: You have the right to request that we correct any inaccuracies in the personal information we hold about you. Deletion: You have the rights to request that we delete the personal information we hold about you, subject to certain exceptions. Objection: You have the right to object to the processing of your personal information for certain purposes, such as direct marketing. Restriction: You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal information in certain circumstances. Withdrawal of Consent: If we are processing your personal information based on your consent, you have the right to withdraw that consent at any time. To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at runchase@gmail.com. We will respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe. Please note that we may require additional information from you to verify your identity before fulfilling your request. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our information practices, please contact us at runchase@gmail.com. RunChase © 2024 RunChase.
